name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]

jobs:
  build-and-deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Set up Docker Buildx
        uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v2

      - name: Log in to Docker Hub
        uses: docker/login-action@v2
        with:
          username: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.DOCKER_PASSWORD }}

      - name: Build and push images
        run: |
          docker build -t <dockerhub-username>/calculatrice:v1 ./service-calculatrice
          docker build -t <dockerhub-username>/statistiques:v1 ./service-statistiques
          docker push <dockerhub-username>/calculatrice:v1
          docker push <dockerhub-username>/statistiques:v1

      - name: Deploy to Kubernetes
        uses: appleboy/ssh-action@v0.1.6
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.K8S_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.K8S_USER }}
          key: ${{ secrets.K8S_KEY }}
          script: |
            kubectl rollout restart deployment monservice
            kubectl rollout restart deployment statistique
